page.title: 14FLEETWOOD FISHING INDUSTRY
page.content: Since the Icelandic cod wars, Fleetwood has declined.Another reason for the decline of this industry is the closure of the Icelandic fishing ground.The unloading of trawlers was originally done by baskets,winches and trestels now the modern method is to use pumps and conveyerbelts. Fleetwood fishes off the west coast of Scotland catching hake.When this became scarce they depended on cod and plaice. The transport has changed over the years,it was originally transported by rail,now it is transported by road around the country. Merchants have changed from wholesale to retail.The catch of fish is: 15 KIT = 1 TONNE Ice land back at sea 1200 KIT Home water 15 days 750 KIT Inshore 6 days 100 KIT Small inshore 24hours 10 KIT
